title: AI
text:
How to use AI effectively
AI is unlikely to replace any of us, but someone who knows AI could replace any of us.
so let’s learn how to use AI effectively

title: AI
text:
Quarto
Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished presentation. To learn more about Quarto presentations see https://quarto.org/docs/presentations/.

title: AI

text:
Code
When you click the Render button a presentation will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:


[1] 2

title: Guidelines for using generative AI
text:
The purpose of an AI is to assist you, not to replace you. To help ensure that the AI is only an assistant it is important to not let the AI think for you. Instead, let it do the boring or tedious work of your task.
For example,

title: AI Tools and Resources
text:
Models
There are a few small language models that I particularly like, in part because I have benchmarked them against various models.

Phi-3 is a surprisingly good model, despite its small size. I find that I usually turn to it when I want to a run a model on my desktop.
Llama-3 has, rightly, gotten a lot of buzz since it was launched because of its overall strong performance on various benchmarks. However, I have been less impressed with it in my small experiments using LM Studio’s Playground feature.
